title: Homemade fish fingers
description: The Hairy Bikers share their simple homemade version of this tea time family favourite dish. Serve with frozen peas. A portion of the fish fingers provides 282 kcal, 28g protein, 18g carbohydrate (of which 0.5g sugars), 11g fat (of which 1.5g saturates), 0.8g fibre and 0.5g salt.
ingredients: 50g/1¾oz golden breadcrumbs (if not available, substitute with 30g/1oz fresh white breadcrumbs mixed with 20g/½oz easy-cook polenta)
salt and freshly ground black pepper
